com.metaio.sdk
Class MetaioSurfaceView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.SurfaceView
          android.opengl.GLSurfaceView
              com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable.Callback, GLSurfaceView.Renderer, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SurfaceHolder.Callback
public final class MetaioSurfaceView
extends GLSurfaceView
implements GLSurfaceView.Renderer

This class implements a custom GLSurfaceView and Renderer for the metaio SDK.

getEGLConfigChooser
Method Detail

getEGLConfigChooser

public static GLSurfaceView.EGLConfigChooser getEGLConfigChooser(int r,
                                                                 int g,
                                                                 int b,
                                                                 int a,
                                                                 int depth,
                                                                 int stencil,
                                                                 int samples)
Get OpenGL ConfigChooser from the specified parameters. See eglChooseConfig for more details.

Parameters:
r - Number of bits of red component
g - Number of bits of green component
b - Number of bits of blue component
a - Number of bits of alpha component
depth - Depth buffer size in bits
stencil - Stencil buffer size in bits
samples - Minimum buffers in multi-sample buffers, e.g. 0, 2 or 4
Returns:
New GLSurfaceView.EGLConfigChooser to be used

globalToLocalViewCoordinates

public PointF globalToLocalViewCoordinates(MotionEvent event,
                                           Rect visibleFrame)
This transforms onTouch global screen coordinates into local view coordinate system, while compensating for the visible window frame and local view dimensions.

Parameters:
event - MotionEvent
visibleFrame - Visible window frame
Returns:
PointF containing touch event coordinates in local view
